short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: hides all youtube video information but the title, channel profile picture, comments, and descriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides all information about youtube videos surrounding user statistics such as views, likes, number of comments, and even video information in youtube studio.
